Title: The Long Road Home
Writer: Alex Coulson, Alex Coulson (story), Adam McKay, Adam McKay (story)
Actors: John Wideman, Martin Cloutier, Mary McKay Shortt, Daniel Allarie
Plot: One year after returning home to Northern Ontario for his parents funeral, Robert Chenaux finds himself face-to-face with a career defining promotion; find the money, close the deal, and ...
